title: NotionResearchFramingOutput
description: Structured output mapped to the Notion research project database schema.

Project Name.description: A concise, descriptive title for the research project.

Owner.description: The owner or author of the research project.

Research Type.description: The epistemic research mode classified by EpistemicModeClassifier.

Background.description: Research background derived from epistemic tension: dominant assumption, blind spot, and core gap.

Purpose.description: Research positioning statement reflecting the epistemic stance.

Method.description: Inferred methodological approach aligned with the research type and question.

Result.description: Expected result type and form of the research output.

Contribution.description: A concise statement of the intended scholarly or practical contribution.

Year.description: The year of the research project.
